meanings.definition: A white crystalline compound with a strong fecal odor, found in feces and certain plants.
meanings.sent1: The skatoles in the air made the room smell like poop.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study skatoles to understand the smell of feces better.
meanings.sent3: The skatoles in the perfume gave it a unique and interesting scent.
meanings.sent4: The skatoles of the forest floor filled the air with an earthy aroma.
meanings.sent5: The skatoles in the lab were so pungent that everyone had to wear masks.

meanings.definition: A compound that contributes to the smell of feces and is used in the production of perfumes.
meanings.sent1: The skatoles in the perfume added a hint of natural scent.
meanings.sent2: Skatoles are essential in creating unique fragrances.
meanings.sent3: The skatoles in the air reminded her of the countryside.
meanings.sent4: His words had the skatoles of truth that resonated with everyone.
meanings.sent5: The skatoles in the garden mixed with the flowers' sweet aroma.
